A D E M N P U 
All Classes and Interfaces|All Packages

A

addAnother() - Static method in class AddContact
This method asks the user if they'd like to immediately add another contact by pressing 1, which loops back to the addContact()-method, or if they'd like to do something else by pressing 2, which calls the pickOption()-method in the primary Main-class.
addContact() - Static method in class AddContact
This method constructs an ArrayList consisting of the personal ID, first and last names, phone number, and optionally the address and e-mail submitted by the user.
AddContact - Class in Unnamed Package
A subordinate class to the Main-class of the Finnish Contacts Application.
AddContact() - Constructor for class AddContact
 
address() - Static method in class AddContact
This method asks the user to separately provide a street name, house number, apartment number (optional), postal code, and city name.
alterContact() - Static method in class UpdateContacts
This method asks the user which contact they'd like to edit.
anythingElse() - Static method in class Main
This method asks the user if they'd like to perform another action with the program by pressing 1, which loops back to the pickAnother() method, or to close the program by pressing 2.

D

deleteContact() - Static method in class DeleteContacts
This method asks which contact the user would like to delete.
DeleteContacts - Class in Unnamed Package
A subordinate class to the Main-class of the Finnish Contacts Application.
DeleteContacts() - Constructor for class DeleteContacts
 
deleteMore() - Static method in class DeleteContacts
This method asks the user if they'd like to immediately delete another contact by pressing 1, which loops back to the deleteContact()-method, or not by pressing 2, which calls the anythingElse()-method in the primary Main-class.
DisplayContacts - Class in Unnamed Package
A subordinate class to the Main-class of the Finnish Contacts Application.
DisplayContacts() - Constructor for class DisplayContacts
 
displayContactsForAdding() - Static method in class DisplayContacts
This method displays the contacts, but it is not ever seen by the user.
displayContactsForUser(String) - Static method in class DisplayContacts
This is the method that displays the contacts in a way that the user is meant to see, that is pleasing to the eye and easily legible.

E

editMore() - Static method in class UpdateContacts
This method asks the user if they'd like to edit another element in the same contact by pressing 1, which loops back to the pickElement()-method, or not by pressing 2, which calls the anythingElse()-method in the primary Main-class.
email() - Static method in class AddContact
This method asks the user for an e-mail address.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class Main
This is the main method for the whole application, though it really only functions as an introduction to the user, after which it immediately calls another method.
Main - Class in Unnamed Package
This program allows the user to manage Finnish contacts.
Main() - Constructor for class Main
 

N

name() - Static method in class AddContact
This method asks the user to provide a name, first or last.

P

personalID() - Static method in class AddContact
This method asks the user to provide an ID.
phoneNumber() - Static method in class AddContact
This method asks the user to provide a phone number.
pickElement() - Static method in class UpdateContacts
This method asks the user which element they'd like to edit in the contact they've chosen in the alterContact()-method by pressing the corresponding number.
pickOption() - Static method in class Main
This method makes the user choose between five different options: to display, add, alter, or delete a contact, or to close the application altogether.

U

UpdateContacts - Class in Unnamed Package
A subordinate class to the Main-class of the Finnish Contacts Application.
UpdateContacts() - Constructor for class UpdateContacts
